title: Let's Be Together And Belarus Will Be Free - Belarusian News - Charter'97
text: Let's Be Together And Belarus Will Be Free [8](/en/news/2023/12/31/577639/comments/#comments) - 31.12.2023, 8:59 - 2,956 Charter's readers are people of action. Dear friends! Our team would like to thank you for your support on the last day of this year. We thank those who start their day with the news feed of the Charter’97 in Minsk, Brest, Mahiliou, New York, Tel Aviv, Warsaw, Białystok, Kyiv, Vilnius and other cities (and read us even in Malaysia), those who comment, those who read us on [Telegram](https://t.me/charter97_org) and other social media, those who watch videos on our [Youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/@Charter97video) and share information with us. Thanks to you, millions of our readers, we remain the most popular Belarusian independent media. We can say publicly that we have the best audience because people of action read Charter. We are especially grateful to those who support our work with [PayPal](https://www.paypal.com/donate/?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=WPS4NY975YGSS&source=url&ssrt=1703958723169) and donations to the Charter'97 Foundation. Your support is extremely important to us. After all, this is direct proof that Belarusians want to know the truth and read the national media and not enemy propaganda. Let's be together and Belarus will be free! Charter97.org Editorial Office
